lines.text: I don't have nothin' to do with pick-ups, see. I'm kinda particular that way.
Ah, couldn't you let a girl sit here 'til it stops raining?
Not a chance. The paper says this rain's gonna keep up for ten days.
No wonder you look so worn out.
I never know how to take you.
Oh, you don't know how to take me?
Did you think I slipped off with your cash?
You seem to have some tough luck with your lady friends.
Meeting her has made you ashamed of the way you met me.
That's what I call a face.
Molly told me the difference betwen a pick-up and a lady. Now I see who the pick-up is.
I sorta ran into her today and...
